location_name: Mont Pèlerin - Views from 700 meters above Lake Genevar
location_short_descr: Mont Pèlerin is a summit of the Swiss plateau located in the municipality of Chardonne in Switzerland.
location_long_descr: Viewpoint 700 m above Lake Geneva accessible by funicular from Vevey through the vineyards of Chardonne, then on foot. Elevator to the top of the relay tower.
